verses.verse: וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> Then I looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הָרָקִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H7549><s%> and behold in the firmament אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that was עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> that was above the head הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> of the cherubims כְּאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone סַפִּ֔יר <S%H5601><s%> over them as it were a sapphire כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance דְּמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> of the likeness כִּסֵּ֑א <S%H3678><s%> of a throne נִרְאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> there appeared עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> above

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> unto the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H906><s%> with linen וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said בֹּא֩ <S%H935><s%> Go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּינ֨וֹת <S%H996><s%> between לַגַּלְגַּ֜ל <S%H1534><s%> the wheels אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לַכְּר֗וּב <S%H3742><s%> [even] under the cherub וּמַלֵּ֨א <S%H4390><s%> and fill חָפְנֶ֤יךָ <S%H2651><s%> thine hand גַֽחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> with coals אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> of fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> from between לַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> the cherubims וּזְרֹ֖ק <S%H2236><s%> and scatter עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> [them] over the city וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> And he went in לְעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> in my sight

וְהַכְּרֻבִ֗ים <S%H3742><s%> Now the cherubims עֹֽמְדִ֛ים <S%H5975><s%> stood מִימִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right side לַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house בְּבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> went in הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> when the man וְהֶעָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> and the cloud מָלֵ֔א <S%H4390><s%> filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִֽית׃ <S%H6442><s%> the inner

וַיָּ֤רָם <S%H7311><s%> went up כְּבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> Then the glory יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַכְּר֔וּב <S%H3742><s%> from the cherub עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> unto מִפְתַּ֣ן <S%H4670><s%> [and stood] over the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַיִּמָּלֵ֤א <S%H4390><s%> was filled הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> and the house אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הֶ֣עָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> with the cloud וְהֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> and the court מָֽלְאָ֔ה <S%H4390><s%> was full אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with נֹ֖גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> of the brightness כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וְקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> And the sound כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> wings הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> of the cherubims' נִשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> was heard עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִיצֹנָ֑ה <S%H2435><s%> [even] to the outer כְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> as the voice אֵל־ <S%H410><s%> God שַׁדַּ֖י <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty בְּדַבְּרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1696><s%> when he speaketh

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּצַוֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H6680><s%> And it came to pass [that] when he had commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man לְבֻֽשׁ־ <S%H3847><s%> clothed הַבַּדִּים֙ <S%H906><s%> with linen לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying קַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> between לַגַּלְגַּ֔ל <S%H1534><s%> from between the wheels מִבֵּינ֖וֹת <S%H996><s%> between לַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> from between the cherubims וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> then he went in וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> beside הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> the wheels

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> stretched forth הַכְּר֨וּב <S%H3742><s%> And [one] cherub אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> between לַכְּרוּבִ֗ים <S%H3742><s%> from between the cherubims אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> unto the fire אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> was between הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> that [was] between the cherubims וַיִּשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> and took וַיִּתֵּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> [thereof] and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חָפְנֵ֖י <S%H2651><s%> [it] into the hands לְבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> of [him that was] clothed הַבַּדִּ֑ים <S%H906><s%> with linen וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> who took וַיֵּצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> [it] and went out

וַיֵּרָ֖א <S%H7200><s%> And there appeared לַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> in the cherubims תַּבְנִית֙ <S%H8403><s%> the form יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of a man's תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כַּנְפֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3671><s%> under their wings

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> And when I looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <S%H702><s%> behold the four אוֹפַנִּים֮ <S%H212><s%> wheels אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַכְּרוּבִים֒ <S%H3742><s%> the cherubims אוֹפַ֣ן <S%H212><s%> wheel אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> one אֵ֚צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַכְּר֣וּב <S%H3742><s%> cherub אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one וְאוֹפַ֣ן <S%H212><s%> wheel אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> and another אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַכְּר֣וּב <S%H3742><s%> cherub אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> another וּמַרְאֵה֙ <S%H4758><s%> and the appearance הָא֣וֹפַנִּ֔ים <S%H212><s%> of the wheels כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> [was] as the colour אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <S%H8658><s%> of a beryl

וּמַ֨רְאֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4758><s%> And [as for] their appearances דְּמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> likeness אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ם <S%H702><s%> they four כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> if יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <S%H212><s%> as if a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> had been in the midst הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> of a wheel

בְּלֶכְתָּ֗ם <S%H1980><s%> moved אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַרְבַּ֤עַת <S%H702><s%> upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶם֙ <S%H7253><s%> sides יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> went לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> they turned בְּלֶכְתָּ֑ם <S%H1980><s%> went כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> in הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> but to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִפְנֶ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> looked הָרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> whither the head אַחֲרָ֣יו <S%H310><s%> as they יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> went לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> it they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽם׃ <S%H1980><s%> moved

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> their whole בְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> And their whole body וְגַבֵּהֶ֔ם <S%H1354><s%> and their backs וִֽידֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> and their hands וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3671><s%> and their wings וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֗ים <S%H212><s%> and the wheels מְלֵאִ֤ים <S%H4392><s%> [were] full עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <S%H5869><s%> of eyes סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֖ם <S%H702><s%> that they four אוֹפַנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H212><s%> [even] the wheels
לָא֖וֹפַנִּ֑ים <S%H212><s%> As for the wheels לָהֶ֛ם קוֹרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> it was cried הַגַּלְגַּ֖ל <S%H1534><s%> O wheel בְּאָזְנָֽי׃ <S%H241><s%> unto them in my hearing

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> had four פָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> faces לְאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> And every one פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> face הָאֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> the first פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [was] the face הַכְּר֗וּב <S%H3742><s%> of a cherub וּפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> face הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> and the second פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [was] the face אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of a man וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> and the third פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the face אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> of a lion וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> and the fourth פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> the face נָֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H5404><s%> of an eagle

וַיֵּרֹ֖מּוּ <S%H7426><s%> were lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> And the cherubims הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he הַחַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> that I saw בִּֽנְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָֽר׃ <S%H3529><s%> of Chebar

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> moved הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> And when the cherubims יֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> go הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <S%H681><s%> by them וּבִשְׂאֵ֨ת <S%H5375><s%> lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֜ים <S%H3742><s%> and when the cherubims אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנְפֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3671><s%> their wings לָרוּם֙ <S%H7311><s%> to mount up מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִסַּ֧בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> turned הָאוֹפַנִּ֛ים <S%H212><s%> the same wheels גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> also מֵאֶצְלָֽם׃ <S%H681><s%> not from beside

בְּעָמְדָ֣ם <S%H5975><s%> When they stood יַעֲמֹ֔דוּ <S%H5975><s%> [these] stood וּבְרוֹמָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> and when they were lifted up יֵר֣וֹמּוּ <S%H7426><s%> [these] lifted up אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> themselves [also] for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> of the living creature בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> departed כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> Then the glory יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over מִפְתַּ֣ן <S%H4670><s%> from off the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <S%H3742><s%> over the cherubims

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <S%H3742><s%> And the cherubims אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּ֠נְפֵיהֶם <S%H3671><s%> their wings וַיֵּר֨וֹמּוּ <S%H7426><s%> and mounted up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth לְעֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> in my sight בְּצֵאתָ֔ם <S%H3318><s%> when they went out וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <S%H5980><s%> also [were] beside וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> them and [every one] stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֔י <S%H6931><s%> of the east וּכְב֧וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> [was] over them above

הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> These הַחַיָּ֗ה <S%H2416><s%> This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i רָאִ֛יתִי <S%H7200><s%> that I saw תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> under the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּֽנְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> of Chebar וָאֵדַ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> and I knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that כְרוּבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> that they [were] the cherubims הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

אַרְבָּעָ֨ה <S%H702><s%> had four אַרְבָּעָ֤ה <S%H702><s%> four פָנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> faces לְאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> Every one וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> had four כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> wings לְאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> apiece וּדְמוּת֙ <S%H1823><s%> and the likeness יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> of the hands אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of a man תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> and beneath כַּנְפֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3671><s%> [was] under their wings

וּדְמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> And the likeness פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> of their faces הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> [was] the same הַפָּנִ֗ים <S%H6440><s%> faces אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whose רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> which I saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָ֔ר <S%H3529><s%> of Chebar מַרְאֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4758><s%> their appearances וְאוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> straight פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> forward יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> went
